verses.name: Matthew 10:25
verses.text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?

verses.name: Matthew 10:26
verses.text: Fear them not therefore: for there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; and hid, that shall not be known.

verses.name: Matthew 10:27
verses.text: What I tell you in darkness, that speak ye in light: and what ye hear in the ear, that preach ye upon the housetops.
